alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Madison; Pickaway (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 11:51PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN FRANKLIN, NORTHERN PICKAWAY AND SOUTHEASTERN MADISON COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 AM EDT... At 1151 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Jefferson, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Grove City, Canal Winchester, Groveport, West Jefferson, Ashville, South Bloomfield, Obetz, Commercial Point, Lithopolis, Urbancrest, Harrisburg, Orient, Lockbourne, East Ringgold, Derby, Lilly Chapel, Duvall, Slate Run Metro Park and Georgesville. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 86 and 102. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
